POUND.name: Pound
POUND.description: A physical attack delivered with a long tail or a foreleg, etc.

KARATECHOP.name: Karate Chop
KARATECHOP.description: The foe is attacked with a sharp chop. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

DOUBLESLAP.name: Double Slap
DOUBLESLAP.description: The foe is slapped repeatedly, back and forth, two to five times.

COMETPUNCH.name: Comet Punch
COMETPUNCH.description: The foe is hit with a flurry of punches that strike two to five times.

MEGAPUNCH.name: Mega Punch
MEGAPUNCH.description: The foe is slugged by a punch thrown with muscle-packed power.

PAYDAY.name: Pay Day
PAYDAY.description: Numerous coins are hurled at the foe. Money is earned after battle.

FIREPUNCH.name: Fire Punch
FIREPUNCH.description: The foe is punched with a fiery fist. It may leave the foe with a burn.

ICEPUNCH.name: Ice Punch
ICEPUNCH.description: The foe is punched with an icy fist. It may leave the foe frozen.

THUNDERPUNCH.name: Thunder Punch
THUNDERPUNCH.description: The foe is punched with an electrified fist. It may leave the foe paralyzed.

SCRATCH.name: Scratch
SCRATCH.description: Hard, pointed, and sharp claws rake the foe.

VICEGRIP.name: Vice Grip
VICEGRIP.description: Huge, impressive pincers grip and squeeze the foe.

RAZORWIND.name: Razor Wind
RAZORWIND.description: Blades of wind hit the foe on the 2nd turn. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

SWORDSDANCE.name: Swords Dance
SWORDSDANCE.description: A frenetic dance of fighting. It sharply raises the Attack stat.

CUT.name: Cut
CUT.description: A basic attack. It can be used to cut down thin trees and grass.

GUST.name: Gust
GUST.description: Strikes the foe with a gust of wind whipped up by wings.

WINGATTACK.name: Wing Attack
WINGATTACK.description: The foe is struck with large, imposing wings spread wide.

WHIRLWIND.name: Whirlwind
WHIRLWIND.description: The foe is made to switch out with an ally. In the wild, the battle ends.

FLY.name: Fly
FLY.description: A 2-turn move that hits on the 2nd turn. Use it to fly to any known town.

BIND.name: Bind
BIND.description: A long body or tentacles are used to bind the foe for two to five turns.

SLAM.name: Slam
SLAM.description: The foe is struck with a long tail, vines, etc.

VINEWHIP.name: Vine Whip
VINEWHIP.description: The foe is struck with slender, whip- like vines.

STOMP.name: Stomp
STOMP.description: The foe is stomped with a big foot. It may make the foe flinch.

DOUBLEKICK.name: Double Kick
DOUBLEKICK.description: Two legs are used to quickly kick the foe twice in one turn.

MEGAKICK.name: Mega Kick
MEGAKICK.description: The foe is attacked by a kick fired with muscle-packed power.

JUMPKICK.name: Jump Kick
JUMPKICK.description: The user jumps up high, then kicks. If it misses, the user hurts itself.

ROLLINGKICK.name: Rolling Kick
ROLLINGKICK.description: A quick kick from a rolling spin. It may make the foe flinch.

SANDATTACK.name: Sand Attack
SANDATTACK.description: The user throw sand at the foe, lowering its Attack.

HEADBUTT.name: Headbutt
HEADBUTT.description: The user sticks its head out and rams. It may make the foe flinch.

HORNATTACK.name: Horn Attack
HORNATTACK.description: The foe is jabbed with a sharply pointed horn to inflict damage.

FURYATTACK.name: Fury Attack
FURYATTACK.description: The foe is jabbed repeatedly with a horn or beak two to five times.

TACKLE.name: Tackle
TACKLE.description: A physical attack in which the user charges, full body, into the foe.

BODYSLAM.name: Body Slam
BODYSLAM.description: The user drops its full body on the foe. It may leave the foe paralyzed.

WRAP.name: Wrap
WRAP.description: A long body or vines are used to wrap the foe for two to five turns.

TAKEDOWN.name: Take Down
TAKEDOWN.description: A reckless, full- body charge attack that also hurts the user a little.

THRASH.name: Thrash
THRASH.description: The user rampages about for two to three turns, then becomes confused.

DOUBLEEDGE.name: Double-Edge
DOUBLEEDGE.description: A reckless, life- risking tackle that also hurts the user a little.

TAILWHIP.name: Tail Whip
TAILWHIP.description: The user wags its tail cutely, making the foe lower its Defense stat.

POISONSTING.name: Poison Sting
POISONSTING.description: The foe is stabbed with a toxic barb, etc. It may poison the foe.

TWINEEDLE.name: Twineedle
TWINEEDLE.description: The foe is stabbed twice with foreleg stingers. It may poison the foe.

PINMISSILE.name: Pin Missile
PINMISSILE.description: Sharp pins are shot at the foe and hit two to five times at once.

LEER.name: Leer
LEER.description: The foe is given an intimidating look that lowers its Defense stat.

BITE.name: Bite
BITE.description: The user bites with vicious fangs. It may make the foe flinch.

GROWL.name: Growl
GROWL.description: The user growls in a cute way, making the foe lower its Attack stat.

ROAR.name: Roar
ROAR.description: The foe is made to switch out with an ally. In the wild, the battle ends.

SING.name: Sing
SING.description: A soothing song in a calming voice lulls the foe into a deep slumber.

SUPERSONIC.name: Supersonic
SUPERSONIC.description: The user generates odd sound waves. It may confuse the foe.

SONICBOOM.name: Sonic Boom
SONICBOOM.description: The foe is hit with a shock wave that always inflicts 20- HP damage.

DISABLE.name: Disable
DISABLE.description: For a few turns, it prevents the foe from using the move it last used.

ACID.name: Acid
ACID.description: The foe is sprayed with a harsh, hide- melting acid that may lower Defense.

EMBER.name: Ember
EMBER.description: The foe is attacked with small flames. The foe may suffer a burn.

FLAMETHROWER.name: Flamethrower
FLAMETHROWER.description: The foe is scorched with intense flames. The foe may suffer a burn.

MIST.name: Mist
MIST.description: The ally party is protected by a mist that prevents stat reductions.

WATERGUN.name: Water Gun
WATERGUN.description: The foe is struck with a lot of water expelled forcibly from the mouth.

HYDROPUMP.name: Hydro Pump
HYDROPUMP.description: A high volume of water is blasted at the foe under great pressure.

SURF.name: Surf
SURF.description: A big wave crashes down on the foe. Can also be used for crossing water.

ICEBEAM.name: Ice Beam
ICEBEAM.description: The foe is struck with an icy beam. It may leave the target frostbitten.

BLIZZARD.name: Blizzard
BLIZZARD.description: The foe is blasted with a blizzard. It may leave the target frostbitten.

PSYBEAM.name: Psybeam
PSYBEAM.description: A peculiar ray is shot at the foe. It may leave the foe confused.

BUBBLEBEAM.name: Bubble Beam
BUBBLEBEAM.description: A spray of bubbles strikes the foe. It may lower the foe's Speed stat.

AURORABEAM.name: Aurora Beam
AURORABEAM.description: A rainbow-colored attack beam. It may lower the foe's Attack stat.

HYPERBEAM.name: Hyper Beam
HYPERBEAM.description: A severely damaging attack that makes the user rest on the next turn.

PECK.name: Peck
PECK.description: The foe is jabbed with a sharply pointed beak or horn.

DRILLPECK.name: Drill Peck
DRILLPECK.description: A corkscrewing attack with the sharp beak acting as a drill.

SUBMISSION.name: Submission
SUBMISSION.description: A reckless, full- body throw attack that also hurts the user a little.

LOWKICK.name: Low Kick
LOWKICK.description: A low, tripping kick that inflicts more damage on heavier foes.

COUNTER.name: Counter
COUNTER.description: A retaliation move that counters any physical hit with double the damage.

SEISMICTOSS.name: Seismic Toss
SEISMICTOSS.description: A gravity-fed throw that causes damage matching the user's level.

STRENGTH.name: Strength
STRENGTH.description: The foe is slugged at maximum power. Can also be used to move boulders.

ABSORB.name: Absorb
ABSORB.description: An attack that absorbs half the damage it inflicted to restore HP.

MEGADRAIN.name: Mega Drain
MEGADRAIN.description: A tough attack that drains half the damage it inflicted to restore HP.

LEECHSEED.name: Leech Seed
LEECHSEED.description: A seed is planted on the foe to steal some HP for the  user on every turn.

GROWTH.name: Growth
GROWTH.description: The user's body is forced to grow, raising the Sp. Atk stat.

RAZORLEAF.name: Razor Leaf
RAZORLEAF.description: The foe is hit with a cutting leaf. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

SOLARBEAM.name: Solar Beam
SOLARBEAM.description: A 2-turn move that blasts the foe with absorbed energy in the 2nd turn.

POISONPOWDER.name: Poison Powder
POISONPOWDER.description: A cloud of toxic dust is scattered. It may poison the foe.

STUNSPORE.name: Stun Spore
STUNSPORE.description: Paralyzing dust is scattered wildly. It may paralyze the foe.

SLEEPPOWDER.name: Sleep Powder
SLEEPPOWDER.description: A sleep-inducing dust is scattered in high volume around a foe.

PETALDANCE.name: Petal Dance
PETALDANCE.description: The user attacks with petals for two to three turns, then gets confused.

STRINGSHOT.name: String Shot
STRINGSHOT.description: The foe is bound with strings shot from the mouth to reduce its Speed.

DRAGONRAGE.name: Dragon Rage
DRAGONRAGE.description: The foe is hit with a shock wave that always inflicts 40- HP damage.

FIRESPIN.name: Fire Spin
FIRESPIN.description: The foe is trapped in an intense spiral of fire that rages two to five turns.

THUNDERSHOCK.name: Thunder Shock
THUNDERSHOCK.description: An electric shock attack that may also leave the foe paralyzed.

THUNDERBOLT.name: Thunderbolt
THUNDERBOLT.description: A strong electrical attack that may also leave the foe paralyzed.

THUNDERWAVE.name: Thunder Wave
THUNDERWAVE.description: An electric shock that causes paralysis. Can't miss if the user is Electric-type.

THUNDER.name: Thunder
THUNDER.description: A brutal lightning attack that may also leave the foe paralyzed.

ROCKTHROW.name: Rock Throw
ROCKTHROW.description: The foe is attacked with a shower of small, easily thrown rocks.

EARTHQUAKE.name: Earthquake
EARTHQUAKE.description: An earthquake that strikes all Pokémon in battle excluding the user.

SOULSTRIKE.name: Soul Robbery
SOULSTRIKE.description: The user consumes the target's soul, stealing the target's stat boosts, and then attacks.

DIG.name: Dig
DIG.description: An attack that hits on the 2nd turn. Can also be used to exit dungeons.

TOXIC.name: Toxic
TOXIC.description: A move that badly poisons the foe. Can't miss if the user is Poison-type.

CONFUSION.name: Confusion
CONFUSION.description: A weak telekinetic attack that may also leave the foe confused.

PSYCHIC.name: Psychic
PSYCHIC.description: A strong telekinetic attack. It may also lower the foe's Sp. Def stat.

HYPNOSIS.name: Hypnosis
HYPNOSIS.description: Hypnotic suggestion is used to make the foe fall into a deep sleep.

MEDITATE.name: Meditate
MEDITATE.description: The user meditates to awaken its power and raise its Attack stat.

AGILITY.name: Agility
AGILITY.description: The user relaxes and lightens its body to sharply boost its Speed.

QUICKATTACK.name: Quick Attack
QUICKATTACK.description: An almost invisibly fast attack that is certain to strike first.

RAGE.name: Rage
RAGE.description: An attack that becomes stronger each time the user is hit in battle.

TELEPORT.name: Teleport
TELEPORT.description: Use it to flee from any wild Pokémon. Also warps to the last Poké Center.

NIGHTSHADE.name: Night Shade
NIGHTSHADE.description: An attack with a mirage that inflicts damage matching the user's level.

MIMIC.name: Mimic
MIMIC.description: The user copies the move last used by the foe for the rest of the battle.

SCREECH.name: Screech
SCREECH.description: An ear-splitting screech is emitted to sharply reduce the foe's Defense.

RECOVER.name: Recover
RECOVER.description: A self-healing move that restores HP by up to half of the user's maximum HP.

HARDEN.name: Harden
HARDEN.description: The user stiffens all the muscles in its body to raise its Defense stat.

SMOKESCREEN.name: Smokescreen
SMOKESCREEN.description: The user throws smoke at the foe, lowering its Attack.

CONFUSERAY.name: Confuse Ray
CONFUSERAY.description: The foe is exposed to a sinister ray that triggers confusion.

WITHDRAW.name: Withdraw
WITHDRAW.description: The user withdraws its body in its hard shell, raising its Defense stat.

DEFENSECURL.name: Defense Curl
DEFENSECURL.description: The user curls up to conceal weak spots and raise its Defense stat.

BARRIER.name: Barrier
BARRIER.description: The user creates a sturdy wall that sharply raises its Defense stat.

LIGHTSCREEN.name: Light Screen
LIGHTSCREEN.description: A wall of light cuts damage from Sp. Atk attacks for five turns.

HAZE.name: Haze
HAZE.description: Eliminates all stat changes among all Pokémon engaged in battle.

REFLECT.name: Reflect
REFLECT.description: A wall of light cuts damage from physical attacks for five turns.

FOCUSENERGY.name: Focus Energy
FOCUSENERGY.description: The user takes a deep breath and focuses to raise its critical-hit ratio.

BIDE.name: Bide
BIDE.description: The user endures attacks for two turns, then strikes back double.

METRONOME.name: Metronome
METRONOME.description: Waggles a finger and stimulates the brain into using any move at random.

MIRRORMOVE.name: Mirror Move
MIRRORMOVE.description: The user counters the move last used by the foe with the same move.

SELFDESTRUCT.name: Self-Destruct
SELFDESTRUCT.description: The user blows up to inflict severe damage, even making itself faint.

EGGBOMB.name: Egg Bomb
EGGBOMB.description: A large egg is hurled with great force at the foe to inflict damage.

LICK.name: Lick
LICK.description: The foe is licked and hit with a long tongue. It may also paralyze.

SMOG.name: Smog
SMOG.description: The foe is attacked with exhaust gases. It may also poison the foe.

SLUDGE.name: Sludge
SLUDGE.description: Toxic sludge is hurled at the foe. It may poison the target.

BONECLUB.name: Bone Club
BONECLUB.description: The foe is clubbed with a bone held in hand. It may make the foe flinch.

FIREBLAST.name: Fire Blast
FIREBLAST.description: The foe is hit with an intense flame. It may leave the target with a burn.

WATERFALL.name: Waterfall
WATERFALL.description: A powerful charge attack. It can also be used to climb a waterfall.

CLAMP.name: Clamp
CLAMP.description: The foe is clamped and squeezed by the user's shell for two to five turns.

SWIFT.name: Swift
SWIFT.description: Star-shaped rays that never miss are fired at all foes in battle.

SKULLBASH.name: Skull Bash
SKULLBASH.description: The user raises its Defense and Attack in the 1st turn, then attacks in the 2nd turn.

SPIKECANNON.name: Spike Cannon
SPIKECANNON.description: Sharp spikes are fired at the foe to strike two to five times.

CONSTRICT.name: Constrict
CONSTRICT.description: The foe is attacked with long tentacles or vines. It may lower Speed.

AMNESIA.name: Amnesia
AMNESIA.description: Forgets about something and sharply raises Sp. Def.

SOFTBOILED.name: Soft-Boiled
SOFTBOILED.description: Heals the user by up to half its full HP. It can be used to heal an ally.

HIGHJUMPKICK.name: High Jump Kick
HIGHJUMPKICK.description: A strong jumping knee kick. If it misses, the user is hurt.

GLARE.name: Glare
GLARE.description: The user intimidates the foe with the design on its belly to cause paralysis.

DREAMEATER.name: Dream Eater
DREAMEATER.description: Absorbs half the damage it inflicted on a sleeping foe to restore HP.

POISONGAS.name: Poison Gas
POISONGAS.description: The foe is sprayed with a cloud of toxic gas that may poison the foe.

LEECHLIFE.name: Leech Life
LEECHLIFE.description: An attack that absorbs half the damage it inflicted to restore HP.

LOVELYKISS.name: Lovely Kiss
LOVELYKISS.description: The user forces a kiss on the foe with a scary face that induces sleep.

SKYATTACK.name: Sky Attack
SKYATTACK.description: A 2nd-turn attack move with a high critical-hit ratio. The foe may flinch.

TRANSFORM.name: Transform
TRANSFORM.description: The user transforms into a copy of the foe with even the same move set.

BUBBLE.name: Bubble
BUBBLE.description: A spray of bubbles hits the foe. It may lower the foe's Speed stat.

DIZZYPUNCH.name: Dizzy Punch
DIZZYPUNCH.description: The foe is hit with a rhythmic punch that may leave it confused.

SPORE.name: Spore
SPORE.description: The user scatters bursts of fine spores that induce sleep.

FLASH.name: Flash
FLASH.description: The user flashes a bright light, which lowers its Attack.

PSYWAVE.name: Psywave
PSYWAVE.description: The foe is attacked with an odd, hot energy wave that varies in intensity.

SPLASH.name: Splash
SPLASH.description: The user just flops and splashes around without having any effect.

ACIDARMOR.name: Acid Armor
ACIDARMOR.description: The user alters its cells to liquefy itself and sharply raise Defense.

CRABHAMMER.name: Crabhammer
CRABHAMMER.description: A large pincer is used to hammer the foe. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

EXPLOSION.name: Explosion
EXPLOSION.description: The user explodes to inflict terrible damage even while fainting itself.

FURYSWIPES.name: Fury Swipes
FURYSWIPES.description: The foe is raked with sharp claws or scythes two to five times.

BONEMERANG.name: Bonemerang
BONEMERANG.description: The user throws a bone that hits the foe once, then once again on return.

REST.name: Rest
REST.description: The user sleeps for two turns to fully restore HP and heal any status problem.

ROCKSLIDE.name: Rock Slide
ROCKSLIDE.description: Large boulders are hurled at the foe. It may make the foe flinch.

HYPERFANG.name: Hyper Fang
HYPERFANG.description: The foe is attacked with sharp fangs. It may make the foe flinch.

SHARPEN.name: Sharpen
SHARPEN.description: The user reduces its polygon count to sharpen edges and raise Attack.

TRIATTACK.name: Tri Attack
TRIATTACK.description: A simultaneous 3-beam attack that may paralyze, burn, or freeze the foe.

SUPERFANG.name: Super Fang
SUPERFANG.description: The user attacks with sharp fangs and halves the foe's HP.

SLASH.name: Slash
SLASH.description: The foe is slashed with claws, etc. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

SUBSTITUTE.name: Substitute
SUBSTITUTE.description: The user creates a decoy using one- quarter of its full HP.

SKETCH.name: Sketch
SKETCH.description: This move copies the move last used by the foe, then disappears.

TRIPLEKICK.name: Triple Kick
TRIPLEKICK.description: A 3-kick attack that becomes more powerful with each successive hit.

THIEF.name: Thief
THIEF.description: An attack that may take the foe's held item if the user isn't holding one.

SPIDERWEB.name: Spider Web
SPIDERWEB.description: Ensnares the foe  with sticky string so it doesn't flee or switch out.

MINDREADER.name: Mind Reader
MINDREADER.description: The user predicts the foe's action to ensure its next attack hits.

NIGHTMARE.name: Nightmare
NIGHTMARE.description: A sleeping foe is shown a nightmare that inflicts some damage every turn.

FLAMEWHEEL.name: Flame Wheel
FLAMEWHEEL.description: The user makes a fiery charge at the foe. It may cause a burn.

SNORE.name: Snore
SNORE.description: An attack that can be used only while asleep. It may cause flinching.

CURSE.name: Curse
CURSE.description: A move that works differently for the Ghost-type and all the other types.

FLAIL.name: Flail
FLAIL.description: A desperate attack that becomes more powerful the less HP the user has.

AEROBLAST.name: Aeroblast
AEROBLAST.description: A vortex of air is shot at the foe. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

COTTONSPORE.name: Cotton Spore
COTTONSPORE.description: Cotton-like spores cling to the foe, sharply reducing its Speed stat.

REVERSAL.name: Reversal
REVERSAL.description: An all-out attack that becomes more powerful the less HP the user has.

SPITE.name: Spite
SPITE.description: A move that cuts 2 to 5 PP from the move last used by the foe.

POWDERSNOW.name: Powder Snow
POWDERSNOW.description: Blasts the foe with a snowy gust. It may cause freezing.

PROTECT.name: Protect
PROTECT.description: Enables the user to evade all attacks. It may fail if used in succession.

MACHPUNCH.name: Mach Punch
MACHPUNCH.description: A punch thrown at blinding speed. It is certain to strike first.

SCARYFACE.name: Scary Face
SCARYFACE.description: Frightens the foe with a scary face to sharply reduce its Speed.

FEINTATTACK.name: Feint Attack
FEINTATTACK.description: The user draws up close to the foe disarmingly, then hits without fail.

SWEETKISS.name: Sweet Kiss
SWEETKISS.description: The user kisses the foe with sweet cuteness that causes confusion.

BELLYDRUM.name: Belly Drum
BELLYDRUM.description: The user maximizes its Attack stat at the cost of half its full HP.

SLUDGEBOMB.name: Sludge Bomb
SLUDGEBOMB.description: Filthy sludge is hurled at the foe. It may poison the target.

MUDSLAP.name: Mud-Slap
MUDSLAP.description: Mud is hurled in the foe's face to inflict damage and lower its accuracy.

OCTAZOOKA.name: Octazooka
OCTAZOOKA.description: Ink is blasted in the foe's face or eyes to deal damage.

SPIKES.name: Spikes
SPIKES.description: A trap of spikes is laid around the foe's party to hurt foes switching in.

ZAPCANNON.name: Zap Cannon
ZAPCANNON.description: An electric blast is fired like a cannon to inflict damage and paralyze.

FORESIGHT.name: Foresight
FORESIGHT.description: Completely negates the foe's efforts to heighten its ability to evade.

DESTINYBOND.name: Destiny Bond
DESTINYBOND.description: If the user faints, the foe delivering the final hit also faints.

PERISHSONG.name: Perish Song
PERISHSONG.description: Any battler that hears this faints in three turns unless it switches.

ICYWIND.name: Icy Wind
ICYWIND.description: A chilling wind is used to attack. It also lowers the Speed stat.

DETECT.name: Detect
DETECT.description: Enables the user to evade all attacks. It may fail if used in succession.

BONERUSH.name: Bone Rush
BONERUSH.description: The user strikes the foe with a bone in hand two to five times.

LOCKON.name: Lock-On
LOCKON.description: The user locks on to the foe, making the next move sure to hit.

OUTRAGE.name: Outrage
OUTRAGE.description: The user thrashes about for two to three turns, then becomes confused.

SANDSTORM.name: Sandstorm
SANDSTORM.description: A 5-turn sandstorm that damages all types except Rock, Ground, and Steel.

GIGADRAIN.name: Giga Drain
GIGADRAIN.description: A harsh attack that absorbs half the damage it inflicted to restore HP.

ENDURE.name: Endure
ENDURE.description: The user endures any hit with 1 HP left. It may fail if used in succession.

CHARM.name: Charm
CHARM.description: The foe is charmed by the user's cute appeals, sharply cutting its Attack.

ROLLOUT.name: Rollout
ROLLOUT.description: A 5-turn rolling attack that becomes stronger each time it hits.

FALSESWIPE.name: False Swipe
FALSESWIPE.description: A restrained attack that always leaves the foe with at least 1 HP.

SWAGGER.name: Swagger
SWAGGER.description: A move that makes the foe confused, but also sharply raises its Attack.

MILKDRINK.name: Milk Drink
MILKDRINK.description: Heals the user by up to half its full HP. It can be used to heal an ally.

SPARK.name: Spark
SPARK.description: An electrically charged tackle that may also paralyze the foe.

FURYCUTTER.name: Fury Cutter
FURYCUTTER.description: An attack that grows stronger on each successive hit.

STEELWING.name: Steel Wing
STEELWING.description: The foe is hit with wings of steel. It may also raise the user's Defense.

MEANLOOK.name: Mean Look
MEANLOOK.description: The foe is fixed with a mean look that prevents it from escaping.

ATTRACT.name: Attract
ATTRACT.description: If it is the other gender, the foe is made infatuated and unlikely to attack.

SLEEPTALK.name: Sleep Talk
SLEEPTALK.description: While asleep, the user randomly uses one of the moves it knows.

HEALBELL.name: Heal Bell
HEALBELL.description: A soothing bell chimes to heal the status problems of all allies.

RETURN.name: Return
RETURN.description: This attack move grows more powerful the more the user likes its Trainer.

PRESENT.name: Present
PRESENT.description: The foe is given a booby-trapped gift. It restores HP sometimes, however.

FRUSTRATION.name: Frustration
FRUSTRATION.description: This attack move grows more powerful the less the user likes its Trainer.

SAFEGUARD.name: Safeguard
SAFEGUARD.description: It protects the user's party from all status problems for five turns.

PAINSPLIT.name: Pain Split
PAINSPLIT.description: The user adds its HP to the foe's HP, then equally shares the total HP.

SACREDFIRE.name: Sacred Fire
SACREDFIRE.description: A mystical and powerful fire attack that may inflict a burn.

MAGNITUDE.name: Magnitude
MAGNITUDE.description: A ground-shaking attack against all standing Pokémon. Its power varies.

DYNAMICPUNCH.name: Dynamic Punch
DYNAMICPUNCH.description: The foe is punched with the user's full power. It confuses the foe if it hits.

MEGAHORN.name: Megahorn
MEGAHORN.description: A brutal ramming attack delivered with a tough and impressive horn.

DRAGONBREATH.name: Dragon Breath
DRAGONBREATH.description: The foe is hit with an incredible blast of breath that may also paralyze.

ENCORE.name: Encore
ENCORE.description: Makes the foe use the move it last used repeatedly for two to six turns.

PURSUIT.name: Pursuit
PURSUIT.description: An attack move that works especially well on a foe that is switching out.

RAPIDSPIN.name: Rapid Spin
RAPIDSPIN.description: An attack that frees the user from Bind, Wrap, Leech Seed, and Spikes.

SWEETSCENT.name: Sweet Scent
SWEETSCENT.description: Allures the foe to reduce evasiveness. It also attracts wild Pokémon.

IRONTAIL.name: Iron Tail
IRONTAIL.description: An attack with a steel-hard tail. It may lower the foe's Defense stat.

METALCLAW.name: Metal Claw
METALCLAW.description: The foe is attacked with steel claws. It may also raise the user's Attack.

VITALTHROW.name: Vital Throw
VITALTHROW.description: Makes the user attack after the foe. In return, it will not miss.

MORNINGSUN.name: Morning Sun
MORNINGSUN.description: Restores the user's HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather.

SYNTHESIS.name: Synthesis
SYNTHESIS.description: Restores the user's HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather.

MOONLIGHT.name: Moonlight
MOONLIGHT.description: Restores the user's HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather.

HIDDENPOWER.name: Hidden Power
HIDDENPOWER.description: An attack that varies in type and intensity depending on the user.

CROSSCHOP.name: Cross Chop
CROSSCHOP.description: The foe is hit with double chops. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

TWISTER.name: Twister
TWISTER.description: A vicious twister attacks the foe. It may make the foe flinch.

RAINDANCE.name: Rain Dance
RAINDANCE.description: A heavy rain falls for five turns, powering up Water- type moves.

SUNNYDAY.name: Sunny Day
SUNNYDAY.description: The sun blazes for five turns, powering up Fire-type moves.

CRUNCH.name: Crunch
CRUNCH.description: The foe is crunched with sharp fangs. It may lower the foe's Sp. Def.

MIRRORCOAT.name: Mirror Coat
MIRRORCOAT.description: A retaliation move that pays back the foe's special attack double.

PSYCHUP.name: Psych Up
PSYCHUP.description: The user hypnotizes itself into copying any stat change made by the foe.

EXTREMESPEED.name: Extreme Speed
EXTREMESPEED.description: A blindingly speedy charge attack that always goes before any other.

ANCIENTPOWER.name: Ancient Power
ANCIENTPOWER.description: An ancient power is used to attack. It may also raise all the user's stats.

SHADOWBALL.name: Shadow Ball
SHADOWBALL.description: A shadowy blob is hurled at the foe. May also lower the foe's Sp. Def.

FUTURESIGHT.name: Future Sight
FUTURESIGHT.description: Two turns after this move is used, the foe is attacked psychically.

ROCKSMASH.name: Rock Smash
ROCKSMASH.description: An attack that may also cut Defense. It can also smash cracked boulders.

WHIRLPOOL.name: Whirlpool
WHIRLPOOL.description: The foe is trapped in a fast, vicious whirlpool for two to five turns.

BEATUP.name: Beat Up
BEATUP.description: The use attacks by bullying the target. It hits two to five times in a row.

FAKEOUT.name: Fake Out
FAKEOUT.description: An attack that hits first and causes flinching. Usable only on 1st turn.

UPROAR.name: Uproar
UPROAR.description: The user attacks in an uproar that prevents sleep for two to five turns.

STOCKPILE.name: Stockpile
STOCKPILE.description: The user charges up power for use later. It can be used three times.

SPITUP.name: Spit Up
SPITUP.description: The power built using Stockpile is released at once for attack.

SWALLOW.name: Swallow
SWALLOW.description: The energy it built using Stockpile is absorbed to restore HP.

HEATWAVE.name: Heat Wave
HEATWAVE.description: The user exhales a heated breath to attack. It may also inflict a burn.

SNOWSCAPE.name: Snowscape
SNOWSCAPE.description: A 5-turn snowstorm that boosts the Def of Ice-types.

TORMENT.name: Torment
TORMENT.description: It enrages the foe, making it incapable of using the same move successively.

FLATTER.name: Flatter
FLATTER.description: Flattery is used to confuse the foe, but its Sp. Atk also rises.

WILLOWISP.name: Will-O-Wisp
WILLOWISP.description: A sinister, bluish white flame is shot to inflict a burn. Can't miss if the user is Fire-type.

MEMENTO.name: Memento
MEMENTO.description: The user faints, but sharply lowers the foe's Attack and Sp. Atk.

FACADE.name: Facade
FACADE.description: An attack that is boosted if user is burned, poisoned, or paralyzed.

FOCUSPUNCH.name: Focus Punch
FOCUSPUNCH.description: An attack that is executed last. The user flinches if hit beforehand.

SMELLINGSALTS.name: Smelling Salts
SMELLINGSALTS.description: Doubly effective on a paralyzed foe, but it also cures the foe's paralysis.

FOLLOWME.name: Follow Me
FOLLOWME.description: The user draws attention to itself, making foes attack only the user.

NATUREPOWER.name: Nature Power
NATUREPOWER.description: An attack that changes type depending on the user's location.

CHARGE.name: Charge
CHARGE.description: The user charges power to boost the Electric move it uses next.

TAUNT.name: Taunt
TAUNT.description: The foe is taunted into a rage that allows it to use only attack moves.

HELPINGHAND.name: Helping Hand
HELPINGHAND.description: A move that boosts the power of the ally's attack in a battle.

TRICK.name: Trick
TRICK.description: A move that tricks the foe into trading held items with the user.

ROLEPLAY.name: Role Play
ROLEPLAY.description: The user mimics the foe completely and copies the foe's ability.

WISH.name: Wish
WISH.description: A self-healing move that restores half the full HP on the next turn.

ASSIST.name: Assist
ASSIST.description: The user randomly picks and uses a move of an allied Pokémon.

INGRAIN.name: Ingrain
INGRAIN.description: The user lays roots that restore HP on every turn. It can't switch out.

SUPERPOWER.name: Superpower
SUPERPOWER.description: A powerful attack, but it also lowers the user's Attack and Defense stats.

MAGICCOAT.name: Magic Coat
MAGICCOAT.description: Reflects back the foe's Leech Seed and any status- damaging move.

RECYCLE.name: Recycle
RECYCLE.description: A move that recycles a used item for use once more.

REVENGE.name: Revenge
REVENGE.description: An attack move that gains in intensity if the target has hurt the user.

BRICKBREAK.name: Brick Break
BRICKBREAK.description: An attack that also breaks any barrier like Light Screen and Reflect.

YAWN.name: Yawn
YAWN.description: A huge yawn lulls the foe into falling asleep on the next turn.

KNOCKOFF.name: Knock Off
KNOCKOFF.description: Knocks down the foe's held item to prevent its use during the battle.

ENDEAVOR.name: Endeavor
ENDEAVOR.description: Gains power the fewer HP the user has compared with the foe.

ERUPTION.name: Eruption
ERUPTION.description: The higher the user's HP, the more powerful this attack becomes.

SKILLSWAP.name: Skill Swap
SKILLSWAP.description: The user employs its psychic power to swap abilities with the foe.

IMPRISON.name: Imprison
IMPRISON.description: Prevents foes from using any move that is also known by the user.

REFRESH.name: Refresh
REFRESH.description: A self-healing move that cures the user of a poisoning, burn, or paralysis.

GRUDGE.name: Grudge
GRUDGE.description: If the user faints, this move deletes the PP of the move that finished it.

SNATCH.name: Snatch
SNATCH.description: Steals the effects of the foe's healing or status- changing move.

SECRETPOWER.name: Secret Power
SECRETPOWER.description: An attack that may have an additional effect that varies with the terrain.

DIVE.name: Dive
DIVE.description: The user dives underwater on the first turn and strikes next turn.

ARMTHRUST.name: Arm Thrust
ARMTHRUST.description: A quick flurry of straight-arm punches that hit two to five times.

CAMOUFLAGE.name: Camouflage
CAMOUFLAGE.description: Alters the user's type depending on the location's terrain.

TAILGLOW.name: Tail Glow
TAILGLOW.description: The user flashes a light that sharply raises its Sp. Atk stat.

LUSTERPURGE.name: Luster Purge
LUSTERPURGE.description: A burst of light injures the foe. It may also lower the foe's Sp. Def.

MISTBALL.name: Mist Ball
MISTBALL.description: A flurry of down hits the foe. It may also lower the foe's Sp. Atk.

FEATHERDANCE.name: Feather Dance
FEATHERDANCE.description: The foe is covered with a mass of down that sharply cuts the Attack stat.

TEETERDANCE.name: Teeter Dance
TEETERDANCE.description: A wobbly dance that confuses all the Pokémon in battle.

BLAZEKICK.name: Blaze Kick
BLAZEKICK.description: A fiery kick with a high critical-hit ratio. It may also burn the foe.

MUDSPORT.name: Mud Sport
MUDSPORT.description: Weakens Electric- type attacks while the user is in the battle.

ICEBALL.name: Ice Ball
ICEBALL.description: A 5-turn rolling attack that becomes stronger each time it rolls.

NEEDLEARM.name: Needle Arm
NEEDLEARM.description: An attack using thorny arms. It may make the foe flinch.

SLACKOFF.name: Slack Off
SLACKOFF.description: The user slacks off and restores its HP by half its full HP.

HYPERVOICE.name: Hyper Voice
HYPERVOICE.description: The user lets loose a horribly loud shout with the power to damage.

POISONFANG.name: Poison Fang
POISONFANG.description: The foe is bitten with toxic fangs. It may also badly poison the foe.

CRUSHCLAW.name: Crush Claw
CRUSHCLAW.description: The foe is attacked with sharp claws. It may also lower the foe's Defense.

BLASTBURN.name: Blast Burn
BLASTBURN.description: The foe is hit with an explosion that can burn. The user recharges unless it KOs the foe.

HYDROCANNON.name: Hydro Cannon
HYDROCANNON.description: The foe is hit with a watery cannon that can frostbite. The user recharges unless it KOs the foe.

METEORMASH.name: Meteor Mash
METEORMASH.description: The foe is hit with a hard, fast punch. It may also raise the user's Attack.

ASTONISH.name: Astonish
ASTONISH.description: An attack using a startling shout. It also may make the foe flinch.

WEATHERBALL.name: Weather Ball
WEATHERBALL.description: An attack that varies in power and type depending on the weather.

AROMATHERAPY.name: Aromatherapy
AROMATHERAPY.description: A soothing scent is released to heal all status problems in the user's party.

FAKETEARS.name: Fake Tears
FAKETEARS.description: The user feigns crying to sharply lower the foe's Sp. Def stat.

AIRCUTTER.name: Air Cutter
AIRCUTTER.description: The foe is hit with razor-like wind. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

OVERHEAT.name: Overheat
OVERHEAT.description: An intense attack that also sharply reduces the user's Sp. Atk stat.

ODORSLEUTH.name: Odor Sleuth
ODORSLEUTH.description: Completely negates the foe's efforts to heighten its ability to evade.

ROCKTOMB.name: Rock Tomb
ROCKTOMB.description: Boulders are hurled at the foe. It also lowers the foe's Speed if it hits.

SILVERWIND.name: Silver Wind
SILVERWIND.description: The foe is attacked with a silver dust. It may raise all the user's stats.

METALSOUND.name: Metal Sound
METALSOUND.description: A horrible metallic screech is used to sharply lower the foe's Sp. Def.

GRASSWHISTLE.name: Grass Whistle
GRASSWHISTLE.description: A pleasant melody is played to lull the foe into a deep sleep.

TICKLE.name: Tickle
TICKLE.description: The foe is made to laugh, reducing its Attack and Defense stats.

COSMICPOWER.name: Cosmic Power
COSMICPOWER.description: The user absorbs a mystic power to raise its Defense and Sp. Def.

WATERSPOUT.name: Water Spout
WATERSPOUT.description: The higher the user's HP, the more powerful this attack becomes.

SIGNALBEAM.name: Signal Beam
SIGNALBEAM.description: The foe is hit with a flashing beam that may also cause confusion.

SHADOWPUNCH.name: Shadow Punch
SHADOWPUNCH.description: The user throws a punch from the shadows. It cannot be evaded.

EXTRASENSORY.name: Extrasensory
EXTRASENSORY.description: The user attacks with an odd power that may make the foe flinch.

SKYUPPERCUT.name: Sky Uppercut
SKYUPPERCUT.description: The user attacks with an uppercut thrown skywards with force.

SANDTOMB.name: Sand Tomb
SANDTOMB.description: The foe is trapped inside a painful sandstorm for two to five turns.

BULLETSEED.name: Bullet Seed
BULLETSEED.description: The user shoots seeds at the foe. Two to five seeds are shot at once.

AERIALACE.name: Aerial Ace
AERIALACE.description: An extremely fast attack against one target. It can't be evaded.

ICICLESPEAR.name: Icicle Spear
ICICLESPEAR.description: Sharp icicles are fired at the foe. It strikes two to five times.

IRONDEFENSE.name: Iron Defense
IRONDEFENSE.description: The user hardens its body's surface to sharply raise its Defense stat.

BLOCK.name: Block
BLOCK.description: The user blocks the foe's way with arms spread wide to prevent escape.

HOWL.name: Howl
HOWL.description: The user howls to raise its spirit and boost its Attack stat.

DRAGONCLAW.name: Dragon Claw
DRAGONCLAW.description: Sharp, huge claws hook and slash the foe quickly and with great power.

FRENZYPLANT.name: Frenzy Plant
FRENZYPLANT.description: The foe is hit with a giant branch that can badly poison. The user recharges unless it KOs.

BULKUP.name: Bulk Up
BULKUP.description: The user bulks up its body to boost both its Attack and Defense stats.

BOUNCE.name: Bounce
BOUNCE.description: The user bounces on the foe on the 2nd turn. It may paralyze the foe.

MUDSHOT.name: Mud Shot
MUDSHOT.description: The user attacks by hurling mud. It also reduces the foe's Speed.

POISONTAIL.name: Poison Tail
POISONTAIL.description: An attack with a high critical-hit ratio. It may also poison the foe.

COVET.name: Covet
COVET.description: A cutely executed attack that also steals the foe's hold item.

VOLTTACKLE.name: Volt Tackle
VOLTTACKLE.description: The user throws an electrified tackle. It hurts the user a little.

MAGICALLEAF.name: Magical Leaf
MAGICALLEAF.description: The foe is attacked with a strange leaf that cannot be evaded.

WATERSPORT.name: Water Sport
WATERSPORT.description: Weakens Fire-type attacks while the user is in the battle.

CALMMIND.name: Calm Mind
CALMMIND.description: The user focuses its mind to raise the Sp. Atk and Sp. Def stats.

LEAFBLADE.name: Leaf Blade
LEAFBLADE.description: The foe is slashed with a sharp leaf. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

DRAGONDANCE.name: Dragon Dance
DRAGONDANCE.description: A mystic, powerful dance that boosts the user's Attack and Speed stats.

ROCKBLAST.name: Rock Blast
ROCKBLAST.description: The user hurls two to five hard rocks at the foe to attack.

SHOCKWAVE.name: Shock Wave
SHOCKWAVE.description: A rapid jolt of electricity strikes the foe. It can't be evaded.

WATERPULSE.name: Water Pulse
WATERPULSE.description: An attack with a pulsing blast of water. It may also confuse the foe.

DOOMDESIRE.name: Doom Desire
DOOMDESIRE.description: A move that attacks the foe with a blast of light two turns after use.

PSYCHOBOOST.name: Psycho Boost
PSYCHOBOOST.description: An intense attack that also sharply reduces the user's Sp. Atk stat.

AIRSLASH.name: Air Slash
AIRSLASH.description: The foe is sliced by a blade of air. It may also make the foe flinch.

AQUAJET.name: Aqua Jet
AQUAJET.description: An almost invisibly fast attack that is certain to strike first.

AQUATAIL.name: Aqua Tail
AQUATAIL.description: The foe is attacked with a swinging tail as vicious as a wave in a storm.

AURASPHERE.name: Aura Sphere
AURASPHERE.description: A blast of aura power is let loose at the foe. It is sure to hit.

AVALANCHE.name: Avalanche
AVALANCHE.description: An attack move that gains in intensity if the target has hurt the user.

BRAVEBIRD.name: Brave Bird
BRAVEBIRD.description: The user tucks in its wings and charges. It also hurts the user.

BUGBUZZ.name: Bug Buzz
BUGBUZZ.description: The user creates a damaging sound wave that may lower the foe's Sp. Def.

BULLETPUNCH.name: Bullet Punch
BULLETPUNCH.description: The user strikes with a tough punch that is certain to strike first.

CHARGEBEAM.name: Charge Beam
CHARGEBEAM.description: The user fires a load of electricity that may raise the user's Sp. Atk.

CLOSECOMBAT.name: Close Combat
CLOSECOMBAT.description: The foe is fought up close. This cuts the user's Defense and Sp. Def.

CROSSPOISON.name: Cross Poison
CROSSPOISON.description: An attack with a high critical-hit ratio. It may also poison the foe.

DARKPULSE.name: Dark Pulse
DARKPULSE.description: The user releases a horrible aura that may also make the foe flinch.

DISCHARGE.name: Discharge
DISCHARGE.description: The user looses an electric flare that hits all Pokémon and may paralyze.

DRACOMETEOR.name: Draco Meteor
DRACOMETEOR.description: An intense attack that also sharply reduces the user's Sp. Atk stat.

DRAGONPULSE.name: Dragon Pulse
DRAGONPULSE.description: The foe is attacked with a shock wave generated by the user's gaping mouth.

DRAINPUNCH.name: Drain Punch
DRAINPUNCH.description: A harsh punch that absorbs half the damage it inflicted to restore HP.

EARTHPOWER.name: Earth Power
EARTHPOWER.description: The ground under the foe erupts. It may also lower the foe's Sp. Def.

ENERGYBALL.name: Energy Ball
ENERGYBALL.description: The foe is blasted with natural energy. It may also lower the foe's Sp. Def.

FOCUSBLAST.name: Focus Blast
FOCUSBLAST.description: The user unleashes its power. It may also lower the foe's Sp. Def.

FORCEPALM.name: Force Palm
FORCEPALM.description: The foe is attacked with a shock wave that may also leave it paralyzed.

GIGAIMPACT.name: Giga Impact
GIGAIMPACT.description: A severely damaging attack that makes the user rest on the next turn.

GRASSKNOT.name: Grass Knot
GRASSKNOT.description: Grass snares and trips the foe. It does more damage to heavier foes.

GUNKSHOT.name: Gunk Shot
GUNKSHOT.description: Filthy garbage is shot at the foe. It may also poison the target.

HAMMERARM.name: Hammer Arm
HAMMERARM.description: The user swings its heavy fist. It also lowers the user's Speed.

HEADSMASH.name: Head Smash
HEADSMASH.description: A reckless, life- risking tackle that also hurts the user terribly.

ICESHARD.name: Ice Shard
ICESHARD.description: The user hurls chunks of ice that are certain to strike first.

IRONHEAD.name: Iron Head
IRONHEAD.description: The foe is slammed with its hard head. It may also make the foe flinch.

LAVAPLUME.name: Lava Plume
LAVAPLUME.description: Scarlet flames wash over all Pokémon in battle. It may also inflict burns.

MAGNETBOMB.name: Magnet Bomb
MAGNETBOMB.description: A steel bomb is stuck to the foe. It is sure to hit.

MUDBOMB.name: Mud Bomb
MUDBOMB.description: The foe is struck with a mud ball.

NASTYPLOT.name: Nasty Plot
NASTYPLOT.description: The user thinks bad thoughts. It sharply raises the Sp. Atk stat.

NIGHTSLASH.name: Night Slash
NIGHTSLASH.description: The user slashes the foe when it can. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

OMINOUSWIND.name: Ominous Wind
OMINOUSWIND.description: Repulsive wind is used to attack. It may also raise all the user's stats.

POWERGEM.name: Power Gem
POWERGEM.description: The user attacks with a ray of light that sparkles like gemstones.

POWERWHIP.name: Power Whip
POWERWHIP.description: The user violently whirls its vines or tentacles to lash the foe.

PSYCHOCUT.name: Psycho Cut
PSYCHOCUT.description: The user tears the foe with psychic blades. It has a high crit ratio.

ROCKCLIMB.name: Rock Climb
ROCKCLIMB.description: A charging attack that may confuse the foe. Can also be used to scale walls.

ROCKPOLISH.name: Rock Polish
ROCKPOLISH.description: The user polishes its body to sharply boost its Speed.

ROCKWRECKER.name: Rock Wrecker
ROCKWRECKER.description: The foe is hit with a huge boulder. The user can't move on the next turn.

ROOST.name: Roost
ROOST.description: A self-healing move that restores HP by up to half of the user's maximum HP.

SEEDBOMB.name: Seed Bomb
SEEDBOMB.description: The user shoots a barrage of hard seeds at the foe.

SHADOWCLAW.name: Shadow Claw
SHADOWCLAW.description: Claws made of shadows rake the foe. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

SHADOWSNEAK.name: Shadow Sneak
SHADOWSNEAK.description: The user extends its shadow to attack. It will strike first.

VACUUMWAVE.name: Vacuum Wave
VACUUMWAVE.description: The user sends a wave of vacuum at the foe. It will strike first.

XSCISSOR.name: X-Scissor
XSCISSOR.description: The user slashes the foe with crossed claws as if they were scissors.

ZENHEADBUTT.name: Zen Headbutt
ZENHEADBUTT.description: The user focuses and rams the foe. It may also make the foe flinch.

SWITCHEROO.name: Switcheroo
SWITCHEROO.description: The user trades held items with the foe faster than the eye can follow.

DRILLRUN.name: Drill Run
DRILLRUN.description: The user rotates its body like a drill. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

BULLDOZE.name: Bulldoze
BULLDOZE.description: The user hits all Pokémon in battle by stomping. Lowers Speed of those hit.

ELECTROWEB.name: Electroweb
ELECTROWEB.description: The user traps the foe in an electric net. It also lowers the foe's Speed.

FLAMECHARGE.name: Flame Charge
FLAMECHARGE.description: The user cloaks itself in flames and attacks. It also ups the user's Speed.

FROSTBREATH.name: Frost Breath
FROSTBREATH.description: The user blows cold air that always lands a critical hit. It can cause frostbite.

HEARTSTAMP.name: Heart Stamp
HEARTSTAMP.description: The foe is hit after a cute act. It may also make the foe flinch.

HONECLAWS.name: Hone Claws
HONECLAWS.description: The user sharpens its claws to raise its Attack and accuracy.

HORNLEECH.name: Horn Leech
HORNLEECH.description: A harsh attack that absorbs half the damage it inflicted to restore HP.

COIL.name: Coil
COIL.description: The user coils up, raising its Attack, Defense, and accuracy.

HURRICANE.name: Hurricane
HURRICANE.description: The foe is caught in a fierce wind. It may also confuse the foe.

ICICLECRASH.name: Icicle Crash
ICICLECRASH.description: Icicles are dropped on the foe. It may also make the foe flinch.

WORKUP.name: Work Up
WORKUP.description: The user rouses itself to raise its Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

QUIVERDANCE.name: Quiver Dance
QUIVERDANCE.description: The user mystically dances, raising its Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed.

LOWSWEEP.name: Low Sweep
LOWSWEEP.description: The user attacks the foe's legs, lowering its Speed stat.

SNARL.name: Snarl
SNARL.description: The user barks menacingly. It also lowers the foe's Sp. Atk.

STRUGGLEBUG.name: Struggle Bug
STRUGGLEBUG.description: While resisting, the user attacks the foe, lowering its Sp. Atk stat.

STEAMROLLER.name: Steamroller
STEAMROLLER.description: The user crushes the foe with its body. It may also make the foe flinch.

STORMTHROW.name: Storm Throw
STORMTHROW.description: The user strikes the foe fiercely. It always results in a critical hit.

VENOSHOCK.name: Venoshock
VENOSHOCK.description: The foe is soaked by a special acid. Its power doubles if the foe is poisoned.

WILDCHARGE.name: Wild Charge
WILDCHARGE.description: The user throws an electrified tackle. It hurts the user a little.

POISONJAB.name: Poison Jab
POISONJAB.description: The foe is stabbed by an arm steeped in poison. It may also poison the foe.

ACIDSPRAY.name: Acid Spray
ACIDSPRAY.description: The user spits fluid that melts the foe. It harshly lowers the foe's Sp. Def.

FIERYDANCE.name: Fiery Dance
FIERYDANCE.description: Cloaked in flames, the user dances. It may also raise the user's Sp. Atk.

CLEARSMOG.name: Clear Smog
CLEARSMOG.description: The user throws a clump of special mud that reverts all stat changes.

LEAFSTORM.name: Leaf Storm
LEAFSTORM.description: An intense attack that also sharply reduces the user's Sp. Atk stat.

STONEEDGE.name: Stone Edge
STONEEDGE.description: The foe is stabbed by sharpened stones. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

PAYBACK.name: Payback
PAYBACK.description: If the user moves after the target, this attack's power will be doubled.

FIREFANG.name: Fire Fang
FIREFANG.description: The user bites the foe. It may also make the foe flinch, or leave it burned.

ICEFANG.name: Ice Fang
ICEFANG.description: The user bites the foe. It may also make the foe flinch, or leave it frozen.

THUNDERFANG.name: Thunder Fang
THUNDERFANG.description: The user bites the foe. It may also make the foe flinch, or paralyze it.

FLAREBLITZ.name: Flare Blitz
FLAREBLITZ.description: A fiery tackle that may leave the foe burned. It also hurts the user a little.

INFERNO.name: Inferno
INFERNO.description: The foe is engulfed by an intense fire that is sure to leave a burn.

HEX.name: Hex
HEX.description: This attack does double damage to a target affected by a status problem.

DUALCHOP.name: Dual Chop
DUALCHOP.description: The user hits the foe with two brutal strikes in one turn.

DOUBLEHIT.name: Double Hit
DOUBLEHIT.description: The user slams the foe twice in a row with a long tail, vines, etc.

COTTONGUARD.name: Cotton Guard
COTTONGUARD.description: The user protects itself with cotton, drastically raising its Defense.

ACROBATICS.name: Acrobatics
ACROBATICS.description: A nimble attack that does double damage if the user has no held item.

FLAMEBURST.name: Flame Burst
FLAMEBURST.description: The user attacks the foe with a bursting flame.

UTURN.name: U-turn
UTURN.description: After attacking, the user switches places with a party Pokémon.

VOLTSWITCH.name: Volt Switch
VOLTSWITCH.description: After attacking, the user switches places with a party Pokémon.

DRAGONTAIL.name: Dragon Tail
DRAGONTAIL.description: The foe is made to switch out with an ally. In the wild, the battle ends.

CIRCLETHROW.name: Circle Throw
CIRCLETHROW.description: The foe is made to switch out with an ally. In the wild, the battle ends.

MIRRORSHOT.name: Mirror Shot
MIRRORSHOT.description: The user looses a flash of energy to damage.

WOODHAMMER.name: Wood Hammer
WOODHAMMER.description: The user slams the foe with its hard body, also hurting itself a little.

HEALPULSE.name: Heal Pulse
HEALPULSE.description: The user emits a healing pulse that restores a target's HP by up to half.

FLASHCANNON.name: Flash Cannon
FLASHCANNON.description: Light energy is shot at the foe. It may also lower the foe's Sp. Def.

BUGBITE.name: Bug Bite
BUGBITE.description: The user bites the foe, eating its berry if it is holding one.

PLUCK.name: Pluck
PLUCK.description: The user pecks the foe, plucking its berry if it is holding one.

SHELLSMASH.name: Shell Smash
SHELLSMASH.description: Sharply raises Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed, but lowers Defense and Sp. Def.

RAGEPOWDER.name: Rage Powder
RAGEPOWDER.description: The user scatters a cloud of powder, making foes attack only the user.

WAKEUPSLAP.name: Wake-Up Slap
WAKEUPSLAP.description: Does double damage to a sleeping foe. It also wakes the foe up, however.

RAZORSHELL.name: Razor Shell
RAZORSHELL.description: The foe is cut by sharp shells. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

COPYCAT.name: Copycat
COPYCAT.description: The user mimics the last move used. Fails if no move has been used yet.

MIRACLEEYE.name: Miracle Eye
MIRACLEEYE.description: Completely negates the foe's efforts to heighten its ability to evade.

SUCKERPUNCH.name: Sucker Punch
SUCKERPUNCH.description: This move allows the user to strike first, if the foe is readying an attack.

SCALD.name: Scald
SCALD.description: Boiling water is shot at the foe. It may also cause a burn.

BRINE.name: Brine
BRINE.description: If the foe's HP is down to half, this attack does double damage.

FAIRYWIND.name: Fairy Wind
FAIRYWIND.description: The user stirs up a fairy wind and strikes the foe with it.

BABYDOLLEYES.name: Baby-Doll Eyes
BABYDOLLEYES.description: A cute stare that lowers the foe's Attack stat. It is sure to go first.

PLAYROUGH.name: Play Rough
PLAYROUGH.description: The foe is roughed up by the user. This may lower the foe's Attack.

MOONBLAST.name: Moonblast
MOONBLAST.description: The foe is attacked with the power of the moon. This may lower its Sp. Atk.

DRAININGKISS.name: Draining Kiss
DRAININGKISS.description: A sweet kiss that absorbs over half the damage inflicted to restore HP.

DAZZLINGGLEAM.name: Dazzling Gleam
DAZZLINGGLEAM.description: The user damages opposing Pokémon by emitting a powerful flash.

DISARMINGVOICE.name: Disarming Voice
DISARMINGVOICE.description: The user lets out a charming cry that cannot be evaded.

STEALTHROCK.name: Stealth Rock
STEALTHROCK.description: Levitating rocks are laid around the foe's party to hurt foes switching in.

TOXICSPIKES.name: Toxic Spikes
TOXICSPIKES.description: Poisoned spikes are laid around the foe's party to hurt foes switching in.

HEALINGWISH.name: Healing Wish
HEALINGWISH.description: The user faints, but will fully heal the Pokémon taking its place.

LUNARDANCE.name: Lunar Dance
LUNARDANCE.description: The user faints, but will fully heal the Pokémon taking its place.

TAILWIND.name: Tailwind
TAILWIND.description: Whips up a tailwind that ups the Speed of all party Pokémon for four turns.

BOOMBURST.name: Boomburst
BOOMBURST.description: The user emits a terrible soundwave that hits everything around it.

INCINERATE.name: Incinerate
INCINERATE.description: The user burns the foe completely, rendering a held Berry useless.

WORRYSEED.name: Worry Seed
WORRYSEED.description: A worrying seed is planted on the foe, making its ability Insomnia.

GASTROACID.name: Gastro Acid
GASTROACID.description: Stomach acid is hurled onto the foe, suppressing its ability.

GEOMANCY.name: Geomancy
GEOMANCY.description: The user's Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed rise sharply on the second turn.

FLOWERSHIELD.name: Flower Shield
FLOWERSHIELD.description: The Defense stat of all Grass-type Pokémon is raised by a strange power.

ROTOTILLER.name: Rototiller
ROTOTILLER.description: The Attack and Sp. Atk stats of all Grass-type Pokémon are raised.

SHIFTGEAR.name: Shift Gear
SHIFTGEAR.description: Rotating its gears, the user raises its Attack and sharply raises its Speed.

STICKYWEB.name: Sticky Web
STICKYWEB.description: A sticky net is woven around the foe's party to slow foes switching in.

STOREDPOWER.name: Stored Power
STOREDPOWER.description: The user attacks with a stored power that grows with each raised stat.

ACUPRESSURE.name: Acupressure
ACUPRESSURE.description: The user sharply raises one of its stats by pressing its stress points.

PUNISHMENT.name: Punishment
PUNISHMENT.description: The more the foe has raised its stats, the greater the move's power.

ASSURANCE.name: Assurance
ASSURANCE.description: Does double damage if the foe has already taken damage this turn.

DRAGONRUSH.name: Dragon Rush
DRAGONRUSH.description: A tackle exhibiting devastating menace. This may also make the target flinch.

DARKVOID.name: Dark Void
DARKVOID.description: All foes are taken into a world of total darkness that makes them sleep.

FEINT.name: Feint
FEINT.description: An attack that hits a protected target. This also lifts the protection.

PHANTOMFORCE.name: Phantom Force
PHANTOMFORCE.description: The user vanishes, then strikes on the next turn, hitting even protected foes.

PETALBLIZZARD.name: Petal Blizzard
PETALBLIZZARD.description: Stirs up a violent petal blizzard, hitting everything around it.

PLAYNICE.name: Play Nice
PLAYNICE.description: The target loses its will to fight. This lowers its Attack.

ROAROFTIME.name: Roar of Time
ROAROFTIME.description: An attack which distorts time. The foe is made to switch out with an ally.

SPACIALREND.name: Spacial Rend
SPACIALREND.description: An attack that tears the space around it. Critical hits land more easily.

MAGMASTORM.name: Magma Storm
MAGMASTORM.description: A maelstrom of fire rages that traps the target for four to five turns.

FINALGAMBIT.name: Final Gambit
FINALGAMBIT.description: The user risks all, dealing damage equal to its HP and then fainting from exhaustion.

SHADOWFORCE.name: Shadow Force
SHADOWFORCE.description: The user vanishes, then strikes on the next turn, hitting even protected foes.

NUZZLE.name: Nuzzle
NUZZLE.description: The target is attacked with electrified cheeks that leave it paralyzed.

RETALIATE.name: Retaliate
RETALIATE.description: If an ally fainted in the previous turn, this attack's damage increases.

JUDGMENT.name: Judgment
JUDGMENT.description: An attack which changes type, depending on which kind of Plate the user is holding.

FREEZEDRY.name: Freeze-Dry
FREEZEDRY.description: An attack which may leave the target frostbitten. It is super effective on Water types.

PSYSHOCK.name: Psyshock
PSYSHOCK.description: An odd psychic wave attacks the target. This attack does physical damage.

ROUND.name: Round
ROUND.description: The user attacks with a song. Others can join in, doing more damage.

TAILSLAP.name: Tail Slap
TAILSLAP.description: The use attacks by hitting the target with its hard tail. It hits two to five times in a row.

GEARGRIND.name: Gear Grind
GEARGRIND.description: The user attacks by throwing two steel gears at it target. This attack hits twice in a row.

NATURALGIFT.name: Natural Gift
NATURALGIFT.description: The type and base power of this move is determined by the user's Berry.

CHIPAWAY.name: Chip Away
CHIPAWAY.description: An attack which is not affected by the target's stat changes.

SMACKDOWN.name: Smack Down
SMACKDOWN.description: A projectile is thrown. A flying foe will fall to the ground.

HYPERSPACEHOLE.name: Hyperspace Hole
HYPERSPACEHOLE.description: The user attacks from a hyperspace hole, hitting even protected targets.

GYROBALL.name: Gyro Ball
GYROBALL.description: A high-speed spin. The slower the user is than the foe, the greater the damage.

HYPERSPACEFURY.name: Hyperspace Fury
HYPERSPACEFURY.description: The target is hit with many arms. This hits protected foes, and lowers the user's Defense.

ATTACKORDER.name: Attack Order
ATTACKORDER.description: The user calls out its underlings to pummel the foe. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

DEFENDORDER.name: Defend Order
DEFENDORDER.description: The user calls out its underlings to shield its body, raising its Defense and Sp. Def stats.

HEALORDER.name: Heal Order
HEALORDER.description: The user calls out its underlings to heal it. The user regains up to half of its max HP.

CAPTIVATE.name: Captivate
CAPTIVATE.description: If the foe is the opposite gender of the user, the foe's Special Attack is harshly lowered.

DEFOG.name: Defog
DEFOG.description: A strong wind blows away the target's obstacles. It also lowers the target's evasiveness.

ORIGINPULSE.name: Origin Pulse
ORIGINPULSE.description: The user attacks opposing Pokémon with countless beams of light that glow a deep blue.

PRECIPICEBLADES.name: Precipice Blades
PRECIPICEBLADES.description: The user attacks opposing Pokémon by manifesting the power of the land in blades of stone.

GUARDSWAP.name: Guard Swap
GUARDSWAP.description: The user uses its psychic power to switch changes to its Defense and Sp. Def with the foe.

STEAMERUPTION.name: Steam Eruption
STEAMERUPTION.description: The user immerses the target in superheated steam. This may also burn the target.

METALBURST.name: Metal Burst
METALBURST.description: The user retaliates with much greater force against the opponent that last did damage to it.

MEFIRST.name: Me First
MEFIRST.description: The user tries to cut ahead of the target to steal and use its intended move with more power.

POWERSWAP.name: Power Swap
POWERSWAP.description: The user uses its psychic power to switch changes to its Attack and Sp. Attack with the foe.

POWERTRICK.name: Power Trick
POWERTRICK.description: The user employs its psychic power to switch its Attack stat with its Defense stat.

PSYCHOSHIFT.name: Psycho Shift
PSYCHOSHIFT.description: Using its psychic power of suggestion, the user transfers its status problems to the target.

WRINGOUT.name: Wring Out
WRINGOUT.description: The user powerfully wrings the target. The more HP the target has, the greater the power.

KINGSSHIELD.name: King's Shield
KINGSSHIELD.description: The user protects itself from damage, and changes the user's form if applicable.

PSYSTRIKE.name: Psystrike
PSYSTRIKE.description: An odd psychic wave attacks the target. This attack does physical damage.

AUTOTOMIZE.name: Autotomize
AUTOTOMIZE.description: The user sheds part of its body to make itself lighter and sharply raise its Speed stat.

DIAMONDSTORM.name: Diamond Storm
DIAMONDSTORM.description: The user whips up a storm of diamonds to damage the foes. This may also raise the user's Defense.

SLUDGEWAVE.name: Sludge Wave
SLUDGEWAVE.description: The area around the user is swamped by a giant sludge wave. It may also poison those hit.

HEAVYSLAM.name: Heavy Slam
HEAVYSLAM.description: The user slams into the target. The greater the weight difference, the greater the damage.

SYNCHRONOISE.name: Synchronoise
SYNCHRONOISE.description: Using an odd shock wave, the user damages same-type Pokémon in the surrounding area.

ELECTROBALL.name: Electro Ball
ELECTROBALL.description: The user hurls an electric orb. The faster the user is than the foe, the greater the damage.

FOULPLAY.name: Foul Play
FOULPLAY.description: The user turns the target's power against it. Power increases with the foe's Attack stat.

ENTRAINMENT.name: Entrainment
ENTRAINMENT.description: The user dances with an odd rhythm, making the target's Ability the same as the user's Ability.

NIGHTDAZE.name: Night Daze
NIGHTDAZE.description: The user releases a pitch-black blast at its target.

ECHOEDVOICE.name: Echoed Voice
ECHOEDVOICE.description: The user attacks the target with a harsh echo. If used every turn, power increases.

LANDSWRATH.name: Land's Wrath
LANDSWRATH.description: The user gathers energy from the land and damages the opposing Pokémon with its power.

OBLIVIONWING.name: Oblivion Wing
OBLIVIONWING.description: The user absorbs its target's HP. The user's HP is restored by over half the damage.

HEARTSWAP.name: Heart Swap
HEARTSWAP.description: The user employs its psychic power to switch stat changes with the target.

AQUAFANG.name: Aqua Fang
AQUAFANG.description: The user bites the foe with aquatic force.

SACREDSWORD.name: Sacred Sword
SACREDSWORD.description: The user attacks by slicing with a long horn. The target's stat changes are ignored.

HEATCRASH.name: Heat Crash
HEATCRASH.description: The user slams down with fire. The more the user outweighs the foe, the greater the damage.

HEADCHARGE.name: Head Charge
HEADCHARGE.description: The user charges its head into its foe. It slightly damages the user and can lower Defense.

TECHNOBLAST.name: Techno Blast
TECHNOBLAST.description: The user fires a beam of light at its foe. The type changes depending on the Drive held.

RELICSONG.name: Relic Song
RELICSONG.description: The user sings an ancient song and attacks the hearts of the listeners. It may induce sleep.

SECRETSWORD.name: Secret Sword
SECRETSWORD.description: The user cuts with its long horn. The odd power in the horn does physical damage to the foe.

GLACIATE.name: Glaciate
GLACIATE.description: The user attacks by blowing freezing cold air at opposing Pokémon. This lowers their Speed.

BOLTSTRIKE.name: Bolt Strike
BOLTSTRIKE.description: The user surrounds itself with abundant electricity that can paralyze and charges its target.

BLUEFLARE.name: Blue Flare
BLUEFLARE.description: The user attacks by engulfing the foe in a severe, beautiful, blue flame. It may burn the foe.

FREEZESHOCK.name: Freeze Shock
FREEZESHOCK.description: A two-turn attack that hits the foe with electrically charged ice. It may paralyze the foe.

ICEBURN.name: Ice Burn
ICEBURN.description: A two-turn attack that surrounds the foe with ultracold, freezing wind. It may burn the foe.

VCREATE.name: V-create
VCREATE.description: The user hurls the hot flame on its forehead. It lowers the user's Def, Sp. Def, and Speed.

FUSIONFLARE.name: Fusion Flare
FUSIONFLARE.description: The user brings down a huge flame. It does more damage when influenced by an enormous bolt.

FUSIONBOLT.name: Fusion Bolt
FUSIONBOLT.description: The user throws down a giant bolt. It does more damage when influenced by an enormous flame.

FELLSTINGER.name: Fell Stinger
FELLSTINGER.description: When the user knocks out a target with this move, the user's Attack stat rises drastically.

NOBLEROAR.name: Noble Roar
NOBLEROAR.description: Letting out a noble roar, the user intimidates the target and lowers its Attack and Sp. Atk.

DRAGONASCENT.name: Dragon Ascent
DRAGONASCENT.description: The user attacks by dropping off from the sky at high speed. This cuts the user's Defense and Sp. Def.

PARTINGSHOT.name: Parting Shot
PARTINGSHOT.description: With a parting threat, the user lowers the foe's Attack and Sp. Atk stats then switches out.

TOPSYTURVY.name: Topsy-Turvy
TOPSYTURVY.description: All stat changes affecting the target turn topsy-turvy and become the opposite of them.

CHATTER.name: Chatter
CHATTER.description: The user attacks the target with sound waves of deafening chatter. This confuses the target.

CONFIDE.name: Confide
CONFIDE.description: The user tells the foe a secret, and it loses concentration. It lowers the foe's Sp.Atk stat.

WATERSHURIKEN.name: Water Shuriken
WATERSHURIKEN.description: The user hits the foe with throwing stars two to five times in a row. This always goes first.

MYSTICALFIRE.name: Mystical Fire
MYSTICALFIRE.description: The user attacks by breathing a special, hot fire. This also lowers the target's Sp. Atk stat.

SPIKYSHIELD.name: Spiky Shield
SPIKYSHIELD.description: Aside from protecting the user from attacks, this also damages attackers who make contact.

EERIEIMPULSE.name: Eerie Impulse
EERIEIMPULSE.description: The user's body generates an impulse. Exposing the foe to it harshly lowers its Sp. Atk stat.

INFESTATION.name: Infestation
INFESTATION.description: The foe is infested and attacked for four to five turns. The target can't flee during this.

POWERUPPUNCH.name: Power-Up Punch
POWERUPPUNCH.description: Striking over and over hardens the user's fists. Hitting a target raises Attack.

THOUSANDARROWS.name: Thousand Arrows
THOUSANDARROWS.description: This move also hits opposing Pokémon in the air. They are knocked down to the ground.

THOUSANDWAVES.name: Thousand Waves
THOUSANDWAVES.description: The user attacks with a wave that crawls along the ground. Those hit can't flee from battle.

PARABOLICCHARGE.name: Parabolic Charge
PARABOLICCHARGE.description: The user attacks everything around it. The user's HP is restored by half the damage.

SEARINGSHOT.name: Searing Shot
SEARINGSHOT.description: The user torches everything around it in an inferno of scarlet flames. It may burn the foes.

SEEDFLARE.name: Seed Flare
SEEDFLARE.description: The user emits a shock wave from its body. This may also harshly lower the target's Sp. Def.

ACCELEROCK.name: Accelerock
ACCELEROCK.description: The user smashes into the target at high speed. This move always goes first.

ANCHORSHOT.name: Anchor Shot
ANCHORSHOT.description: The user entangles the target with its anchor chain while attacking. The target cannot flee.

AURORAVEIL.name: Aurora Veil
AURORAVEIL.description: This move reduces damage from physical and special moves for five turns during a snowstorm.

BANEFULBUNKER.name: Baneful Bunker
BANEFULBUNKER.description: Aside from protecting the user from attacks, this also poisons attackers who make contact.

BEAKBLAST.name: Beak Blast
BEAKBLAST.description: The user heats up its beak, and attacks. Making contact while heating up causes a burn.

BRUTALSWING.name: Brutal Swing
BRUTALSWING.description: The user swings its body around violently to inflict damage on everything in its vicinity.

BURNUP.name: Burn Up
BURNUP.description: The user burns itself out. After using this move, the user will no longer be Fire type.

CLANGINGSCALES.name: Clanging Scales
CLANGINGSCALES.description: The user rubs its scales and makes a huge noise to attack. The user's Def stat goes down.

DARKESTLARIAT.name: Darkest Lariat
DARKESTLARIAT.description: The user swings both arms and hits the target. The target's stat changes are ignored.

DRAGONHAMMER.name: Dragon Hammer
DRAGONHAMMER.description: The user uses its body like a hammer to attack the target and inflict damage.

FIRELASH.name: Fire Lash
FIRELASH.description: The user strikes the target with a burning lash. This also lowers the target's Defense stat.

FIRSTIMPRESSION.name: First Impression
FIRSTIMPRESSION.description: Although this move has great power, it only works the first turn the user is in battle.

FLEURCANNON.name: Fleur Cannon
FLEURCANNON.description: The user unleashes a strong beam. The attack's recoil harshly lowers the user's Sp. Atk stat.

FLORALHEALING.name: Floral Healing
FLORALHEALING.description: The user restores up to half the max HP of the target. It restores more HP on Grassy Terrain.

GEARUP.name: Gear Up
GEARUP.description: The user engages its gears to raise the Attack and Sp. Atk of allies with the Plus or Minus Ability.

HIGHHORSEPOWER.name: High Horsepower
HIGHHORSEPOWER.description: The user fiercely attacks the target using its entire body.

ICEHAMMER.name: Ice Hammer
ICEHAMMER.description: The user swings with a heavy, icy fist to attack the target.

LASERFOCUS.name: Laser Focus
LASERFOCUS.description: The user concentrates intensely. The attack on the next turn always results in a critical hit.

LEAFAGE.name: Leafage
LEAFAGE.description: The user attacks by pelting the target with leaves.

LIQUIDATION.name: Liquidation
LIQUIDATION.description: The user slams into the foe using a full-force water blast. This may lower the foe's Defense.

LUNGE.name: Lunge
LUNGE.description: The user makes a lunge at the foe, attacking with full force. This lowers the foe's Attack.

MOONGEISTBEAM.name: Moongeist Beam
MOONGEISTBEAM.description: The user emits a sinister ray. This can be used on the target regardless of its Ability.

MULTIATTACK.name: Multi-Attack
MULTIATTACK.description: Cloaking itself in high energy, the user slams into the foe. Its type depends on the memory.

NATURESMADNESS.name: Nature's Madness
NATURESMADNESS.description: The user hits the target with the force of nature. It halves the target's HP.

POLLENPUFF.name: Pollen Puff
POLLENPUFF.description: The user attacks the foe with exploding pollen puff. If target is an ally, it heals instead.

POWERTRIP.name: Power Trip
POWERTRIP.description: The user boasts its strength. The more the user's stats are raised, the greater the power.

PRISMATICLASER.name: Prismatic Laser
PRISMATICLASER.description: The user shoots powerful lasers using prism power. The user can't move on the next turn.

PSYCHICFANGS.name: Psychic Fangs
PSYCHICFANGS.description: The user bites the target with psychic capabilities. This destroys Light Screen and Reflect.

PURIFY.name: Purify
PURIFY.description: The user heals the target's status condition. If the move succeeds, it also heals the user's HP.

REVELATIONDANCE.name: Revelation Dance
REVELATIONDANCE.description: The user attacks the target by dancing very hard. The user's type determines this move's type.

SHADOWBONE.name: Shadow Bone
SHADOWBONE.description: The user attacks by beating the foe with a bone that has a spirit. It may lower Defense.

SHELLTRAP.name: Shell Trap
SHELLTRAP.description: The user sets a shell trap. If the user is hit by a physical move, the trap will explode.

SHOREUP.name: Shore Up
SHOREUP.description: The user regains up to half of its max HP. It restores more HP in a sandstorm.

SMARTSTRIKE.name: Smart Strike
SMARTSTRIKE.description: The user stabs the target with a sharp horn. This attack never misses.

SOLARBLADE.name: Solar Blade
SOLARBLADE.description: In this two-turn move, the user gathers light and fills a blade with light's energy to attack.

SPARKLINGARIA.name: Sparkling Aria
SPARKLINGARIA.description: The user bursts into song, emitting bubbles. Any burnt Pokémon will be healed.

SPECTRALTHIEF.name: Spectral Thief
SPECTRALTHIEF.description: The user hides in the target's shadow, steals the target's stat boosts,and then attacks.

SPEEDSWAP.name: Speed Swap
SPEEDSWAP.description: The user exchanges Speed stats with the target.

SPIRITSHACKLE.name: Spirit Shackle
SPIRITSHACKLE.description: The user attacks while stitching the target's shadow to the ground to prevent escape.

SPOTLIGHT.name: Spotlight
SPOTLIGHT.description: The user shines a spotlight on the target so that only the target will be attacked.

STOMPINGTANTRUM.name: Stomping Tantrum
STOMPINGTANTRUM.description: If the user's previous moves has failed, the power of this move doubles.

STRENGTHSAP.name: Strength Sap
STRENGTHSAP.description: The user drains HP equal to the foe's Attack and lowers it.

SUNSTEELSTRIKE.name: Sunsteel Strike
SUNSTEELSTRIKE.description: The user slams the target with a meteor force. This move disregards the target's Ability.

TEARFULLOOK.name: Tearful Look
TEARFULLOOK.description: The user gets teary eyed to look pitiful. This lowers the target's Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

THROATCHOP.name: Throat Chop
THROATCHOP.description: The user attacks the foe's throat to prevent it from using moves that emit sound for two turns.

TOXICTHREAD.name: Toxic Thread
TOXICTHREAD.description: The user shoots poisonous threads to poison the target and lower the target's Speed stat.

TROPKICK.name: Trop Kick
TROPKICK.description: The user lands an intense kick of tropical origins on the target. It lowers Attack.

ZINGZAP.name: Zing Zap
ZINGZAP.description: A strong electric blast crashes down on the target. This may make the target flinch.

ELECTRICTERRAIN.name: Electric Terrain
ELECTRICTERRAIN.description: The user electrifies the ground for five turns, powering up Electric moves and eluding sleep.

GRASSYTERRAIN.name: Grassy Terrain
GRASSYTERRAIN.description: The user turns the ground to grass for five turns, powering up Grass moves and restoring HP.

MISTYTERRAIN.name: Misty Terrain
MISTYTERRAIN.description: The user covers the ground in mist for five turns, halving Dragon moves and preventing status.

PSYCHICTERRAIN.name: Psychic Terrain
PSYCHICTERRAIN.description: The user makes the ground weird for five turns, boosting Psychic moves and blocking priority.

TRICKROOM.name: Trick Room
TRICKROOM.description: The user creates a bizarre area in which slower Pokémon get to move first for five turns.

MAGICROOM.name: Magic Room
MAGICROOM.description: The user creates a bizarre area in which Pokémon's held items lose effect for five turns.

WONDERROOM.name: Wonder Room
WONDERROOM.description: The user creates a bizarre area where Pokémon's Defense and Sp. Def swap for five turns.

CRAFTYSHIELD.name: Crafty Shield
CRAFTYSHIELD.description: The user protects itself and its allies from status moves with a mysterious power.

MATBLOCK.name: Mat Block
MATBLOCK.description: Using a pulled-up mat as a shield, the user protects itself and its allies from damaging moves.

QUICKGUARD.name: Quick Guard
QUICKGUARD.description: The user protects itself and its allies from priority moves.

WIDEGUARD.name: Wide Guard
WIDEGUARD.description: The user protects itself and its allies from wide- ranged attacks. It may fail.

AQUARING.name: Aqua Ring
AQUARING.description: The user envelops itself in a veil made of water. It regains some HP every turn.

AROMATICMIST.name: Aromatic Mist
AROMATICMIST.description: The user raises the Sp. Def stat of an ally Pokémon by using a mysterious aroma.

BELCH.name: Belch
BELCH.description: The user lets out a damaging belch at the target. The user must eat a held Berry to use this.

BESTOW.name: Bestow
BESTOW.description: The user passes its held item to the target when the target isn't holding an item.

FLING.name: Fling
FLING.description: The user flings its held item at the target to attack. Its power and effect depend on the item.

FLYINGPRESS.name: Flying Press
FLYINGPRESS.description: The user dives down onto the target from the sky. This move is both Fighting and Flying type.

GRAVITY.name: Gravity
GRAVITY.description: Gravity intensifies for five turns, preventing moves that use flight and negating Levitate.

GUARDSPLIT.name: Guard Split
GUARDSPLIT.description: The user employs its psychic power to average its Defense and Sp. Def stats with the target.

HEALBLOCK.name: Heal Block
HEALBLOCK.description: The user prevents the opposing team from using any HP recovery for five turns.

IONDELUGE.name: Ion Deluge
IONDELUGE.description: The user disperses electrically charged particles, changing Normal- to Electric- type moves.

LUCKYCHANT.name: Lucky Chant
LUCKYCHANT.description: The user chants an incantation that prevents foes from landing critical hits for five turns.

MAGNETRISE.name: Magnet Rise
MAGNETRISE.description: The user levitates using electrically generated magnetism for five turns.

MAGNETICFLUX.name: Magnetic Flux
MAGNETICFLUX.description: The user manipulates magnets to up Def and Sp. Def stats of allies with Plus or Minus Ability.

POWDER.name: Powder
POWDER.description: The user covers the target in a powder that explodes if it uses a Fire-type move.

POWERSPLIT.name: Power Split
POWERSPLIT.description: The user employs its psychic power to average its Attack and Sp. Atk stats with the target.

REFLECTTYPE.name: Reflect Type
REFLECTTYPE.description: The user reflects the target's type, making it the same type as the target.

SIMPLEBEAM.name: Simple Beam
SIMPLEBEAM.description: The user's mysterious psychic wave changes the target's Ability to Simple.

SOAK.name: Soak
SOAK.description: The user shoots a torrent of water at the target and changes the target's type to Water.

TRICKORTREAT.name: Trick-or-Treat
TRICKORTREAT.description: The foe is brought trick-or-treating. This adds Ghost type to the target's type.

VENOMDRENCH.name: Venom Drench
VENOMDRENCH.description: The user sprays a poisonous liquid that lowers Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed of poisoned foes.

FORESTSCURSE.name: Forest's Curse
FORESTSCURSE.description: The user puts a forest curse on the target. The target is now Grass type as well.

MINDBLOWN.name: Mind Blown
MINDBLOWN.description: The user attacks everything around it by making its head explode. This also damages the user.

PHOTONGEYSER.name: Photon Geyser
PHOTONGEYSER.description: A pillar of light that deals physical or special damage based on the user's better stat.

PLASMAFISTS.name: Plasma Fists
PLASMAFISTS.description: The user attacks with electrically charged fists. This makes Normal-type moves Electric-type.

ELECTRIFY.name: Electrify
ELECTRIFY.description: If the target is electrified before its move in the turn, the target's move becomes Electric.

EMBARGO.name: Embargo
EMBARGO.description: It prevents the target from using items. Its Trainer also can't use items on it.

FAIRYLOCK.name: Fairy Lock
FAIRYLOCK.description: By locking down the battlefield, the user keeps all Pokémon from fleeing during the next turn.

LIGHTOFRUIN.name: Light of Ruin
