LIGHTOFRUIN.description: The user fires a powerful beam of light. This also damages the user.

TRUMPCARD.name: Trump Card
TRUMPCARD.description: The fewer PP this move has, the greater its power.

AFTERYOU.name: After You
AFTERYOU.description: The user helps the target and makes it use its move right after the user.

QUASH.name: Quash
QUASH.description: The user suppresses the target and makes its move go last.

HAPPYHOUR.name: Happy Hour
HAPPYHOUR.description: This move triples the amount of prize money won after battle.

DOUBLEIRONBASH.name: Double Iron Bash
DOUBLEIRONBASH.description: The user centers its hex nut and strikes twice with its arms. It may cause flinching.

LASTRESORT.name: Last Resort
LASTRESORT.description: It can only be used after the user has exhausted all other moves it knows in battle.

SKYDROP.name: Sky Drop
SKYDROP.description: It takes the enemy into the sky, where it can't attack. It is dropped next turn.

CELEBRATE.name: Celebrate
CELEBRATE.description: The Pokémon congratulates you on your special day!.

DYNAMAXCANNON.name: Dynamax Cannon
DYNAMAXCANNON.description: The user unleashes a strong beam that deals double damage to Dynamaxed targets.

SNIPESHOT.name: Snipe Shot
SNIPESHOT.description: The user ignores the effects of moves and Abilities that draw in moves.

JAWLOCK.name: Jaw Lock
JAWLOCK.description: The user bites down, preventing the tar- get from switching out.

STUFFCHEEKS.name: Stuff Cheeks
STUFFCHEEKS.description: The user consumes its held Berry, then raises its Defense sharply.

NORETREAT.name: No Retreat
NORETREAT.description: All of the user's stats are raised, but it can no longer switch out or flee.

TARSHOT.name: Tar Shot
TARSHOT.description: Sticky tar lowers the target's Speed, and makes it weaker to Fire-type moves.

MAGICPOWDER.name: Magic Powder
MAGICPOWDER.description: The user scatters magic powder that changes the target into a Psychic-type.

DRAGONDARTS.name: Dragon Darts
DRAGONDARTS.description: The user attacks twice. If there are two targets, each is hit once.

TEATIME.name: Teatime
TEATIME.description: All Pokémon on the field have teatime. Each Pokémon eats its held Berry.

OCTOLOCK.name: Octolock
OCTOLOCK.description: The user traps the foe and makes its Defense and Sp. Def fall each turn.

BOLTBEAK.name: Bolt Beak
BOLTBEAK.description: If the user moves before the target, the power of this move is doubled.

FISHIOUSREND.name: Fishious Rend
FISHIOUSREND.description: If the user moves before the target, the power of this move is doubled.

COURTCHANGE.name: Court Change
COURTCHANGE.description: The user swaps the effects on either side of the field.

CLANGOROUSSOUL.name: Clangorous Soul
CLANGOROUSSOUL.description: The user raises all of its stats by using some of its HP.

BODYPRESS.name: Body Press
BODYPRESS.description: The higher the user's Defense, the more damage it will inflict.

DECORATE.name: Decorate
DECORATE.description: The user sharply raises the target's Attack and Sp. Atk by decorating it.

DRUMBEATING.name: Drum Beating
DRUMBEATING.description: The user plays its drum to attack. The target's Speed stat is lowered.

SNAPTRAP.name: Snap Trap
SNAPTRAP.description: The user snares the target in a snap trap for four to five turns.

PYROBALL.name: Pyro Ball
PYROBALL.description: The user launches a fiery ball at the target. It may also cause a burn.

BEHEMOTHBLADE.name: Behemoth Blade
BEHEMOTHBLADE.description: The user becomes a sword and strikes. Double damage on Dynamaxed targets.

BEHEMOTHBASH.name: Behemoth Bash
BEHEMOTHBASH.description: The user becomes a shield and strikes. Double damage on Dynamaxed targets.

AURAWHEEL.name: Aura Wheel
AURAWHEEL.description: The user raises its Speed and attacks. The move's Type can change based on its form.

BREAKINGSWIPE.name: Breaking Swipe
BREAKINGSWIPE.description: The user attacks by swinging its tail, lowering both the targets' Attack.

BRANCHPOKE.name: Branch Poke
BRANCHPOKE.description: The user attacks the target by poking it with a pointed branch.

OVERDRIVE.name: Overdrive
OVERDRIVE.description: The user twangs its guitar, which causes an echo and strong vibrations.

APPLEACID.name: Apple Acid
APPLEACID.description: The user attacks with acid made from tart apples. Lowers the foe's Sp. Def.

GRAVAPPLE.name: Grav Apple
GRAVAPPLE.description: The user attacks by dropping an apple from above. Lowers the foe's Defense.

SPIRITBREAK.name: Spirit Break
SPIRITBREAK.description: The user attacks with spirit-breaking force, lowering the target's Sp. Atk.

STRANGESTEAM.name: Strange Steam
STRANGESTEAM.description: The user attacks by emitting steam. The steam may also confuse the target.

LIFEDEW.name: Life Dew
LIFEDEW.description: The user scatters water that restores the HP of itself and its allies.

OBSTRUCT.name: Obstruct
OBSTRUCT.description: The user protects itself, and harshly lowers the foe's Defense on contact.

FALSESURRENDER.name: False Surrender
FALSESURRENDER.description: The user bows, then uses its hair to stab the foe. It never misses.

METEORASSAULT.name: Meteor Assault
METEORASSAULT.description: The foe is hit with a thick leek that can paralyze. The user recharges unless it KOs the foe.

ETERNABEAM.name: Eternabeam
ETERNABEAM.description: Eternatus's most powerful attack. The user must rest on the next turn.

STEELBEAM.name: Steel Beam
STEELBEAM.description: It fires a beam of steel from its body, which also hurts the user.

EXPANDINGFORCE.name: Expanding Force
EXPANDINGFORCE.description: The move's power increases and damages all opposing targets in Psychic Terrain.

STEELROLLER.name: Steel Roller
STEELROLLER.description: The user attacks while destroying terrain. The move fails if there's no terrain.

SCALESHOT.name: Scale Shot
SCALESHOT.description: It hits two to five times in a row. Raises Speed, but lowers Defense.

METEORBEAM.name: Meteor Beam
METEORBEAM.description: In this two-turn move, the user gathers space power and increases Sp. Atk.

SHELLSIDEARM.name: Shell Side Arm
SHELLSIDEARM.description: Bypasses opponent's ability. May cause poison.

MISTYEXPLOSION.name: Misty Explosion
MISTYEXPLOSION.description: The user explodes. It halves Sp. Def, and becomes stronger in Misty Terrain.

GRASSYGLIDE.name: Grassy Glide
GRASSYGLIDE.description: The user glides on the ground to attack. Moves first on Grassy Terrain.

RISINGVOLTAGE.name: Rising Voltage
RISINGVOLTAGE.description: The user attacks with voltage that doubles its power on Electric Terrain.

TERRAINPULSE.name: Terrain Pulse
TERRAINPULSE.description: The move's type and power depends on the terrain currently used in battle.

SKITTERSMACK.name: Skitter Smack
SKITTERSMACK.description: The user skitters behind the target to attack. It lowers the foe's Sp.Atk stat.

POLTERGEIST.name: Poltergeist
POLTERGEIST.description: The user controls the target's item to attack. Fails if the target has no item.

COACHING.name: Coaching
COACHING.description: The user coaches its ally, raising the ally's Attack and Defense stats.

FLIPTURN.name: Flip Turn
FLIPTURN.description: After attacking, the user switches places with a party Pokémon.

TRIPLEAXEL.name: Triple Axel
TRIPLEAXEL.description: A 3-kick attack that becomes more powerful with each successive hit.

DUALWINGBEAT.name: Dual Wingbeat
DUALWINGBEAT.description: The user slams the target with its wings. The target is hit twice in a row.

SCORCHINGSANDS.name: Scorching Sands
SCORCHINGSANDS.description: The user throws scorching sand at the target. It may also inflict burn.

JUNGLEHEALING.name: Jungle Healing
JUNGLEHEALING.description: The user restores HP and the status of itself and its ally in battle.

WICKEDBLOW.name: Wicked Blow
WICKEDBLOW.description: The user strikes the foe fiercely. It always results in a critical hit.

SURGINGSTRIKES.name: Surging Strikes
SURGINGSTRIKES.description: The user strikes three consecutive times. It always results in a critical hit.

FREEZINGGLARE.name: Freezing Glare
FREEZINGGLARE.description: The user attacks with psychic power. It may leave the target frozen.

THUNDEROUSKICK.name: Thunderous Kick
THUNDEROUSKICK.description: The user delivers a fierce kick that lower's the target's defense stat.

FIERYWRATH.name: Fiery Wrath
FIERYWRATH.description: The user attacks with intense, dark flames. It may also make the foe flinch.

THUNDERCAGE.name: Thunder Cage
THUNDERCAGE.description: A cage made of elec- tricity that traps the target for four to five turns.

DRAGONENERGY.name: Dragon Energy
DRAGONENERGY.description: The higher the user's HP, the more powerful this attack becomes.

GLACIALLANCE.name: Glacial Lance
GLACIALLANCE.description: The user attacks by hurling an ice- cloaked lance.

FORBIDDENSPELL.name: Forbidden Spell
FORBIDDENSPELL.description: The user conjures an ancient, corrupt spell that brings unexpected power.

ZIPPYZAP.name: Zippy Zap
ZIPPYZAP.description: The user bursts with electricity, going first and always resulting in a critical hit.

SAPPYSEED.name: Sappy Seed
SAPPYSEED.description: The user scatters seeds to attack, draining the target's HP every turn.

FREEZYFROST.name: Freezy Frost
FREEZYFROST.description: The user attacks with a large crystal that removes all stat changes on the field.

SPARKLYSWIRL.name: Sparkly Swirl
SPARKLYSWIRL.description: The user attacks with a whirlwind that heals status problems on the user's party.

BOUNCYBUBBLE.name: Bouncy Bubble
BOUNCYBUBBLE.description: The user attacks with water bubbles that drains half the damage it inflicted.

SONICSLASH.name: Sonic Slash
SONICSLASH.description: The user attacks with a swift slash that becomes strong- er the faster the user is.

DRACOBARRAGE.name: Draco Barrage
DRACOBARRAGE.description: This attack beats beats fairy immunities but hurts the user. Changes split based off which is stronger.

STONEAXE.name: Stone Axe
STONEAXE.description: The user swings with an axe that has a high-crit ratio and sets Stealth Rocks.

HEADLONGRUSH.name: Headlong Rush
HEADLONGRUSH.description: The user tackles the target, cutting  its own defenses as a result.

VICTORYDANCE.name: Victory Dance
VICTORYDANCE.description: The user triumphantly dances, raising its Attack, Defense, and Speed.

INFERNALPARADE.name: Inferno Parade
INFERNALPARADE.description: This attack deals double damage to a target with a status problem, and can inflict a burn.

CEASELESSEDGE.name: Ceaseless Edge
CEASELESSEDGE.description: This attack has a high crit rate and sets a layer of spikes.

TRIPLEARROWS.name: Triple Arrows
TRIPLEARROWS.description: This attack has a high chance of a critical hit, can lower Defense, and flinch.

BARBBARRAGE.name: Barb Barrage
BARBBARRAGE.description: This attack deals double damage to a target with a status problem, and can in- flict poison.

CHLOROBLAST.name: Chloroblast
CHLOROBLAST.description: The user launches its amassed chloro- phyll to inflict damage. It also hurts the user a little.

BITTERMALICE.name: Bitter Malice
BITTERMALICE.description: This attack deals double damage to a target with a status problem, and can frostbite the foe.

ESPERWING.name: Esper Wing
ESPERWING.description: The user slashes the target with aura- enriched wings that raise Speed. It has a high crit ratio.

DIRECLAW.name: Dire Claw
DIRECLAW.description: A slash that may poison, paralyze, or sleep the foe. It has a high crit ratio.

PSYSHIELDBASH.name: Psyshield Bash
PSYSHIELDBASH.description: The user slams into the foe with psychic energy. It raises the user's Defense too.

MYSTICALPOWER.name: Mystical Power
MYSTICALPOWER.description: After dealing damage, the user raises its Special Attack.

MOUNTAINGALE.name: Mountain Gale
MOUNTAINGALE.description: The user hurls giant chunks of ice at the foe that may cause it to flinch.

WAVECRASH.name: Wave Crash
WAVECRASH.description: The user is shrouded in water and slams the foe. It also hurts the user a little.

FLOWERTRICK.name: Flower Trick
FLOWERTRICK.description: The user throws flow- ers at the target. This move always results in a critical hit.

TORCHSONG.name: Torch Song
TORCHSONG.description: The user scorches the target, boosting the user's Sp. Atk.

AQUASTEP.name: Aqua Step
AQUASTEP.description: The user toys with the target, boosting the user's Speed.

HYPERDRILL.name: Hyper Drill
HYPERDRILL.description: The user drills the target quickly, hit- ting through pro- tection.

ARMORCANNON.name: Armor Cannon
ARMORCANNON.description: The user shoots fiery projectiles. This cuts the user's Defense and Sp. Def.

BITTERBLADE.name: Bitter Blade
BITTERBLADE.description: The user bitterly slashes. This absorbs half the damage it inflicts.

AQUACUTTER.name: Aqua Cutter
AQUACUTTER.description: The foe is cut by sharp pressurized water. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

RAGEFIST.name: Rage Fist
RAGEFIST.description: The more times the user has been hit, the stronger this move becomes.

LASTRESPECTS.name: Last Respects
LASTRESPECTS.description: The more fallen allies on the user's party, the stronger this becomes.

SHEDTAIL.name: Shed Tail
SHEDTAIL.description: The user creates a half HP substitute and passes it to an ally.

GLAIVERUSH.name: Glaive Rush
GLAIVERUSH.description: After this hits, the foe cannot miss the next turn, and deals double damage.

JETPUNCH.name: Jet Punch
JETPUNCH.description: The user punches with a fast torrent that is certain to strike first.

SPINOUT.name: Spin Out
SPINOUT.description: The user spins angrily, inflicting damage. This sharply lowers the user's Speed.

COLLISIONCOURSE.name: Collision Course
COLLISIONCOURSE.description: The user crashes, causing a huge explosion. Power is boosted if it's super-effective.

ELECTRODRIFT.name: Electro Drift
ELECTRODRIFT.description: The user races, piercing the foe with sharp electricity. Power is boosted if it's super-effective.

GIGATONHAMMER.name: Gigaton Hammer
GIGATONHAMMER.description: The user swings with a huge hammer. This move can't be used twice in a row.

RAGINGBULL.name: Raging Bull
RAGINGBULL.description: The user tackles like a raging bull. This move type depends on the user's form. Breaks screens.

TWINBEAM.name: Twin Beam
TWINBEAM.description: The user fires beams from its eyes at the target. This move hits twice.

KOWTOWCLEAVE.name: Kowtow Cleave
KOWTOWCLEAVE.description: The user slashes at the target after kow- towing. This move never misses.

DOUBLESHOCK.name: Double Shock
DOUBLESHOCK.description: The user releases a lot of electricity. After using this move, the user will not be Electric type.

TRAILBLAZE.name: Trailblaze
TRAILBLAZE.description: The user attacks suddenly, boost- ing its Speed.

POUNCE.name: Pounce
POUNCE.description: The user pounces on the target, lowering its Speed stat.

MAKEITRAIN.name: Make It Rain
MAKEITRAIN.description: The user attacks with a mass of coins, lowering its Sp. Atk.

POPULATIONBOMB.name: Population Bomb
POPULATIONBOMB.description: The user gathers in droves for an attack that hits one to ten times in a row.

SILKTRAP.name: Silk Trap
SILKTRAP.description: The user protects itself, and lowers the foe's Speed stat on contact.

AXEKICK.name: Axe Kick
AXEKICK.description: The user attack can confuse the target, and damages itself upon a miss.

LUMINACRASH.name: Lumina Crash
LUMINACRASH.description: The user attacks with a strange light. It harshly lowers the foe's Sp. Def.

ICESPINNER.name: Ice Spinner
ICESPINNER.description: The user spins with ice, dealing damage and destroying terrain.

SALTCURE.name: Salt Cure
SALTCURE.description: This move damages every turn. Steel and Water types are more affected.

TRIPLEDIVE.name: Triple Dive
TRIPLEDIVE.description: The user hits the target with three splashes of water in a row.

MORTALSPIN.name: Mortal Spin
MORTALSPIN.description: The user spins away hazards, and poisons opposing Pokémon.

FILLETAWAY.name: Fillet Away
FILLETAWAY.description: The user sharply boosts its Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed by using its own HP.

CHILLYRECEPTION.name: Chilly Reception
CHILLYRECEPTION.description: The user switches with a party Poké- mon and sets a snowstorm.

COMEUPPANCE.name: Comeuppance
COMEUPPANCE.description: The user retaliates with much greater force against the opponent that last did damage to it.

TIDYUP.name: Tidy Up
TIDYUP.description: The user raises its Attack and Speed stat, and removes hazards.

RUINATION.name: Ruination
RUINATION.description: The user summons a ruinous di- saster. It halves the target's HP.

PSYBLADE.name: Psyblade
PSYBLADE.description: The user cuts with an ethereal blade. Has boosted power in Electric Terrain.

HYDROSTEAM.name: Hydro Steam
HYDROSTEAM.description: The user blasts with hot water. Has boosted power in Sun.

SPRINGTIDESTORM.name: Springtide Storm
SPRINGTIDESTORM.description: The foe is caught in a wind filled with love and hate. Can lower Atk.

BLEAKWINDSTORM.name: Bleakwind Storm
BLEAKWINDSTORM.description: The foe is caught in a fierce cold wind that can cause frostbite.

WILDBOLTSTORM.name: Wildbolt Storm
WILDBOLTSTORM.description: The foe is caught in a wind filled with lightning. Can paralyze.

SANDSEARSTORM.name: Sandsear Storm
SANDSEARSTORM.description: The foe is caught in a wind filled with hot sand. Can inflict burn.
